alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 1:33PM CDT until May 15 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CRAWFORD AND SOUTHWESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 133 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sullivan, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sullivan, St. Cloud, Japan and Stanton. This also includes Meramec State Park. This includes Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 225 and 230. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
